title: Setting the scene: designer interviews [rushes]
brief_description: A joint production between ACMI and AFTRS, the rushes of interviews with Australian production designers Victor Lam, Chris Kennedy, Roger Ford, Karen Murphy, Owen Paterson, Elizabeth Mary Moore and Stephen Curtis where they speak of their own process and challenges as designers as well as the production design in other films.
